Bello:
This material world there is a lot we don't know things. Want to buy a beautiful dress also need to use coins? So I decided to make more valuable items. The research path although very hard, but thanks to the Elves of the assistance realized very amazing skills.
Utilize these learned skills, I will assist you to get a wide variety of special props. Of course, in order to obtain the special items must have the corresponding material is also taken for granted?
